item.title: Hupyter: Convert Jupyter Notebooks to Hugo Posts
item.description: Please refer to the documentation of hupyter repo . I love writing tutorials in Jupyter Notebooks and I want to convert them to Hugo posts on my blog . I tried nb2hugo by vlunot but it lacks two functions: It seems that if I’ve converted it before, then I have to delete the converted blog posts in /content/ before I can convert again. It does not update the image path automatically.

item.title: How to Plot Curves for Functions in R
item.description: y <- function(x) { x^2 } curve(y, from=1, to=50, xlab='x', ylab='y') y <- function(x) {2^x} curve(y, from=1, to=10, xlab="x", ylab="y") The above codes are from https://stackoverflow.com/a/26091375.

item.title: Attention: Python Set is Changing From Time to Time
item.description: I just learned this several days ago: set in python is unsorted and changes from time to time. For example: a = ['a', 'b', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'd', 'e'] set(a) If you run the codes twice (in two different notebooks or scripts), the results are different. To solve this problem: list(set(a)).sort()
